details.name: AP Notes
details.description: Access all detail information, return unit and control numbers for all payable notes within the system

details.name: AP Misc PO Header and Detail
details.description: Access and view all Miscellaneous Purchase Order information within Fusion

details.name: Accounting Address Information
details.description: Access all addresses stored within the Fusion business system

details.name: Account Allocation
details.description: Display the allocation tables specified in Fusion, along with the allocation breakdown for each by Branch/Department and the list of breakdown accounts specified in the setup form of the Allocation Table
